news: Welcome to our new feature! Stay tuned for regular updates and exciting news about our radio community.

header: DMR User Database Android (1.0.20241215) (130) *new start logic first time* *no data in download version (app size)* *after first start latest database will be downloaded* *fixed menu and screen structure* *things have moved a lot hopefully more logic*
news: Dear Testers :) update app thru the playstore https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.einstein.dmr_database_app
